findings.rationale: An indefinite term may expose the Receiving Party to perpetual obligations, which can be burdensome and may lead to unforeseen liabilities.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.rationale: The absence of a specified timeline for the return of Confidential Information can lead to delays and potential misuse of sensitive information.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, the Receiving Party shall return all Confidential Information to the Disclosing Party.

findings.rationale: A broad definition may lead to ambiguity and disputes regarding what constitutes confidential information, potentially exposing the Receiving Party to unexpected liabilities.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party.
